name: Cauldron Caller
description:
A co-op potion making party game where one player attempts to communicate the correct recipe and order of ingredients to another player through drawing in a crystal ball in an allotted time.

The correct order is top to bottom. The ingredient on the top should be the first thing, the one on the bottom should be the last. 

If you want less time per slide, you can also press the 'spacebar' to advance the game forward before the time limit reaches the end. 

Global Game Jam 2018
Theme: Transmission
